sentences.chinese: 亥十七萬七千一百四十七分六萬五千五百三十六。

sentences.chinese: 生黃鐘術曰：以下生者，倍其實，三其法。
sentences.literal: Live Huangzhong method says: below living ones, double their real, three their method.

sentences.chinese: 以上生者，四其實，三其法。

sentences.chinese: 上九，商八，羽七，角六，宮五，徵九。

Place one and nine triple it to make method.
Real like method, obtain length one inch.

sentences.chinese: 凡得九寸，命曰「黃鐘之宮」。
